caption.center: STATE OF NEW JERSEY, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. WILLIAM BRADFORD,

opinion.posture: On petition for certification to Appellate Division, Superior Court.
opinion.attorneys:
Mr. Stanley C. VanNess and Mr. Claude J. Minter for the petitioner.
